federal.name: Companies Income Tax (CIT)
federal.description: Tax on profits of registered companies in Nigeria.
federal.payment_info: Paid by companies annually via FIRS e-payment after audited accounts are prepared.
federal.rate: 30% (20% for small companies below ₦25 million turnover)

federal.name: Petroleum Profits Tax (PPT)
federal.description: Tax on profits from petroleum operations.
federal.payment_info: Paid by upstream oil and gas companies to FIRS monthly and annually.

federal.name: Value Added Tax (VAT)
federal.description: Consumption tax on goods and services.
federal.payment_info: Collected by businesses from customers and remitted monthly to FIRS.

federal.name: Capital Gains Tax (CGT)
federal.description: Tax on gains from disposal of chargeable assets.
federal.payment_info: Individuals and companies pay on disposals; filed with FIRS.

federal.name: Stamp Duties
federal.description: Tax on written and electronic documents.
federal.payment_info: Paid on agreements, contracts, and receipts to FIRS or state IRS.
federal.rate: Varies (flat or ad valorem, e.g., 1.5% on certain transactions)

federal.name: Tertiary Education Tax (TET)
federal.payment_info: Paid annually by companies to FIRS along with CIT.

federal.name: National Information Technology Development Levy (NITDL)
federal.description: Levy for IT development in Nigeria.
federal.payment_info: Paid by companies with ₦100 million+ turnover to FIRS annually.

federal.name: Customs and Excise Duties
federal.description: Tax on imported and certain locally manufactured goods.
federal.payment_info: Paid by importers at ports or manufacturers to Nigeria Customs Service.

federal.name: Withholding Tax (WHT)
federal.description: Advance payment of income tax on specified transactions.
federal.payment_info: Deducted at source by the payer and remitted to FIRS monthly.

state.name: Personal Income Tax (PAYE and Direct Assessment)
state.description: Tax on personal income of residents.
state.payment_info: Paid monthly via PAYE by employers or directly by self-employed to state IRS.

state.name: Road Taxes
state.description: Tax for vehicle registration and renewal.
state.payment_info: Paid by vehicle owners at state revenue offices or VIO.

state.name: Business Premises Levy
state.description: Tax for operating business premises in a state.
state.payment_info: Paid annually to state IRS or Ministry of Commerce.
state.rate: ₦10,000 for urban, ₦5,000 for rural (varies by state)

state.name: Hotel, Restaurant, and Event Centre Consumption Tax
state.description: Tax on goods and services consumed in hotels, restaurants, and event centers.
state.payment_info: Collected by the businesses and remitted to state IRS monthly.

state.name: Land Use Charge / Property Tax
state.description: Tax on property ownership and occupancy.
state.payment_info: Paid annually by property owners to the state government.
state.rate: Varies (e.g., 0.375% of property value in Lagos)

local.name: Tenement Rates
local.description: Rates on occupancy of buildings within LGA jurisdiction.
local.payment_info: Paid annually to the local government.
local.rate: Varies by location and property value

local.name: Market Taxes and Levies
local.description: Daily or weekly levies on traders in markets.
local.payment_info: Paid by market traders to LGA revenue collectors.

local.name: Shops and Kiosks Rates
local.description: Rates for owning or renting kiosks and shops.

local.name: Motor Park Levies
local.description: Levies for using motor parks under LGA control.
local.payment_info: Paid by commercial drivers daily or weekly.

local.name: Slaughter Slab Fees
local.payment_info: Paid by butchers at point of slaughter.

others.name: Industrial Training Fund (ITF)
others.payment_info: Paid by employers with 5+ employees annually.

others.name: Pension Contributions
others.payment_info: Paid monthly by employers and employees to PFAs.

others.name: Employee Compensation Scheme (ECS)
others.description: Contribution for employee workplace injury insurance.
